title: Take My Life, And Let It Be
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: Take my life, and let it be
Take my moments and my days,
Let them flow in ceaseless praise,
Let them flow in ceaseless praise.
v2: Take my hands, and let them move
At the impulse of Thy love.
Take my feet and let them be
v3: Take my voice, and let me sing
Take my lips, and let them be
v4: Take my silver and my gold;
Not a mite would I withhold.
Every pow'r as Thou shalt choose,
Every pow'r as Thou shalt choose.
v5: Take my will, and make it Thine;
It shall be no longer mine.
Take my heart; it is Thine own;
It shall be Thy royal throne,
It shall be Thy royal throne.
v6: Take my love; my Lord, I pour
Take myself, and I will be
